name: UNALTERED
description:
UNALTERED

  The game is a retro puzzle & platformer game. This game has been made within 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

We're controlling a character which named Mutiel. He can move and jump. 

Another character is a robot. Named Luro. It can control player inventory.

UNALTERED has TWO endings. One is low chaos ending and another is high chaos ending.

For low chaos ending, player must do what developer says.

For high chaos ending, player must do the opposite thing what developer says.

We have an NPC named Trosh ;)

Don't worry the game has tutorial :D

Sounds, Graphics and Codes made by me.

Unity pixel perfect camera used.
